item.description: I always have fun at the "Ratskeller" bar in the German Club in Pawtucket, which is open Friday nights at 7. There's a good selection of German beer on draft and food prepared by volunteers (usually a few kinds of sausage, sauerkraut, potato salad, and some specials), and both the beer and food is at really great prices. Let's meet up on August 12th! It's open until late so if you can't come right at 7, don't worry.
item.name: German Club in Pawtucket
